main event: A circular object with a dome on top and an orange glow was observed over Colorado Springs, Colorado in 1967.
interesting points: The object was described as being the size of an old-fashioned wash tub.
The object was seen by multiple witnesses over the course of an hour, with three separate sightings reported.
The object appeared to move around slowly and then suddenly disappear.
Military and civilian agencies were unable to identify the object.
No photographs were provided with the report.
sighted object: circular object with a dome on top and an orange glow
